No there isnt an open world map, just set tracks. But most of them are pretty large.

185567753.review:
プレイして思いました。
「これ、ドリフトシミュじゃなくて、ドリフトラジコンシミュだ」
京商などが展開しているドリフトRCカーの挙動ですねこれ、ジャイロ乗せてるやつ
だからカウンターが半自動でめちゃ操作しやすいです
だからと言って面白くない訳じゃなく、ハンコン持ってないコントローラー勢でも十分に楽しめるゲームに仕上がってます（勿論ハンコンでも面白いです。特にMTだと）
あとセッティングでかなり極端な設定にもできて、それも面白いです
ただ、野良でオンラインいってもほぼマッチングしないので、出来ればCPUカーと走れるモードがあると良いなと思います
ワークショップMODで沢山のコースが公開されているので、無限に遊べます
これが2千円切っているなんて、ドリフト好きなら買わない理由がないと思いますよ

185565056.review: game is always crashing as soon i start up.

185560414.review: its fun if u want racing and drifing

185551265.review:
Com toda a certeza essa é a melhor experiência de simulador de drift que já tive o prazer de jogar, carx drift além de ser extremamente leve na questão de exigência gráfica, também é uma opção bem justa para quem procura um simulador veicular em geral.
  O jogo apresenta ótimas e muito detalhadas opções de modificações, onde o game brilha por sinal, além de opções visuais como os lindos body kits, o jogo também tem opções de definições de potência do carro como hp, aceleração, troca de marchas, motores, e também amortecedores e rodas.
  Muitas opções de carros, muitos carros famosos e com diferenças muito claras entre eles como o peso e o tamanho de cada, que de fato influência nos trajetos e competições,  E TEM UM CAMINHÃO É SÉRIO!!!, agora voltando ao review hahaha.
  E por final tenho apenas uma reclamação que é o fato de algumas colisões ter um efeito inesperado dependendo da sua velocidade, que pode ser apenas parar totalmente o seu carro ou voar para o infinito e além. Mesmo assim eu recomendo e aprovo o jogo em geral sem ter raiva ou problema algum em toda minha exp dentro do jogo, o jogo nunca deu crash e também nunca colapsou de alguma forma, ótimos gráficos e lindos mapas originais, mesmo sendo muito mais legal jogar os feitos pela comunidade hahahaha, te amo equipe carx, que venham muitos jogos com esse tamanho carinho e dedicação, meus parabéns

Dodawania serwerow do ulubionych, tworzenia serwerow za pomoca natywnej apki / konsoli. Nie liczac lekkiego chaosu w menu, np. aby dodac modyfikacje w aucie, cokolwiek zmienic - trzeba wyjsc z serwera online do warsztatu, i pozniej wracajac liczyc ze jest miejsce aby dolaczyc. 184758100.review: Perfect game for bad devices, smooth gameplay with controller, keyboard, and wheel it has mixture of arcade and realistic physics making it perfect for casuals, it is very cheap for how much content it has both in game and in the steam shop, also it supports mods so there is really no limit to content. it provides very very good car customization in both old iconic cars and brand new super cars it provides customization to every interior part both in color and parts, same for the outside since every car has a variety of bodykits that you can also mix, you can color each part whatever you want with whatever texture you want for example mat, metalic, plus you can choose from a verity of materials like carbon fiber. it has a very strong online player base with servers with at least 16 players 24/7. You can also play offline since it has a good offline reward system as well. The progression feels perfect or a little fast witch is good because you want to test as much cars as you want. The game is primary for drifting but you can find some drag racing and grip racing servers. the game allows you to engine swap and tune your car as much you want so you can create some track beasts or drag cars along with the drift cars.

184453372.review: Should not be in the sim category. Its an arcade style drift game but the physics are not realistic nor is the force feedback for steering wheel users. The game makes the car drift. For a claimed drifting simulator you'd think they wouldn't remove the aspect of initiating a drift. You'll be accelerating in a straight line and the car will turn sideways magically. The force feedback doesn't correlate to the slip angle of the steering. truly awful physics but a wide selection of cars if you can play long enough without getting motion sickness from the physics to unlock them.

184398488.review:
Rating: 9/10
Review:
CarX Drift Racing Online is one of the best drifting games available on Steam, offering a fantastic blend of realistic physics and engaging gameplay. The drifting mechanics feel incredibly satisfying, whether you’re a casual player or a hardcore drifting enthusiast.

The variety of cars and customization options are a huge plus, allowing you to tweak everything from your car’s visuals to its performance. The multiplayer mode is where the game truly shines—you can join lobbies, drift with friends, and even participate in tandem drifting.

The graphics are solid, and the tracks are diverse and well-designed, catering to different skill levels. While there’s a bit of a learning curve for beginners, the game rewards practice with smooth, rewarding drifting experiences.

The only minor downside is the lack of broader content outside of drifting (e.g., racing modes), but for what it sets out to do, CarX Drift Racing Online absolutely delivers.

Highly recommended for fans of drifting and racing games!

184278840.review: If your intent is to play this with a wheel, just don't. While using a controller, the game is quite satisfying to watch the cars slide back and forth. However the second you move to a sim wheel, the game becomes a hot mess. You either hit the gas too hard and spin out, or don't hit it enough and no drift. There is basically zero in-between, with very little help online. All that gets you is comments like "you haven't been playing long enough to learn HOW THIS GAME SPECIFICALLY HANDLES PHYSICS" It is literally branded as a ultra realistic drifting sim, but it ends up feeling like a free to play phone game complete with micro-transactions.

184093084.review:
Am Anfang scheint das Spiel vielleicht etwas schwer zu sein, man dreht sich schnell ein, kann die kurven kaum driften und anstatt quer zu driften hängt man mehr in den Wänden als auf der Straße... ABER gebt den Spiel wirklich ein paar Stunden Zeit, ändert die settings vom Auto und man wird sehr schnell eine Verbesserung merken. 
Auf den Onlineservern sind eigentlich nur gute und freundliche Leute unterwegs in jeder Sprache und man findet für jeden den richtigen Tandem Buddy. Mit der richtigen Musik und den richtigen Leuten ist es eine regelrächte Sucht einfach Tür an Tür den Abend zu genießen.
Also gebt dem Spiel eine Chance und glaubt mir, ihr werdet viele Momente haben in dem ihr ein Grinsen im Gesicht bekommt wenn man Tür an Tür durch die Straße driftet 
Also man sieht sich und "Stay sideways" <3
